name: Roguelike Chess
description:
In Roguelike Chess, you become another piece on the world's board, but with a difference: You are special, you have a vision of the board, you know the rules and you know exactly what to do: DESTROY ENEMIES!


You start as a simple piece that can move one square to each side, but each round, you can buy a card to gain abilities that range from moving one more square at a time to attacking from a distance or an extra life.
